about_the_game:
A modern take on the classic brick breaking game. Assemble a deck of spells that determine not only your abilities but also the layout of the brick breaking level. As you destroy the bricks that make up the pattern you have chosen the effect of your spell grows in power. These spells alone however will not be enough to defeat the enemies that stand before you. Collect unique relics that will augment your spells and provide unique changes to your gameplay experience.

Key Features

  • Unique spells that determine the pattern of each brick breaking level.
  • Relics that provide interesting and helpful twists to how the game plays.
  • Special events complete with their own unique brick breaking layouts.
  • Roguelike gameplay that provides an unique experience each time you play.
